active_incidents.title: Some users may experience issues accessing api.slack.com

notes.body:
Some users have reported SSL errors due to our SSL certificates rotating. 
These can be due to using an outdated client, operating system, or a misconfigured system clock.

Please reach out to our team at feedback@slack.com for support with this issue.

Some users may be experiencing trouble with accessing api.slack.com due to an expired SSL cert. Weâ€™re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
